response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe it's important to strike a fair deal. After careful consideration, I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. This figure reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also allows me to ensure a reasonable return on my investment. I trust this proposal will be agreeable to you, given the product's worth to you stands at $1,200,000. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
